error.no_email: Apple did not provide an email address. Please use another sign-in method.

offline_no_token.title: Offline
offline_no_token.message: You are not connected to the internet and no token is stored.

offline_expired_token.title: Offline
offline_expired_token.message: Your JWT has expired. Please connect to the internet to refresh it.

offline_not_verified.title: Offline
offline_not_verified.message: Your account is not verified. Please verify your email to continue.

offline_action_blocked.title: Offline
offline_action_blocked.message: This action is not available offline.

disclaimer.consent_prefix: by continuing you agree to the
disclaimer.info: A citizen science project focused on the diversity of birdsong. By recording the song of Yellowhammers across the Czech Republic, you can help us understand how bird dialects are maintained in the landscape.
disclaimer.dev_notice: The app and the web are still undergoing very rapid development. We apologize for any bugs. Look forward to frequent updates and improvements.

errors.invalidEmailFormat: Email is not in a valid format

consent.con1: By participating in the citizen science project Dialects of Czech Yellowhammers

user_exists.title: User already exists
user_exists.content: A user with this email already exists.

errors.mail_format_err: Email is not in a valid format
errors.continue_consent: You must agree to the terms to continue.

emailSent.title: E-mail sent
emailSent.message:
We've just sent an e-mail to {email}.
Delivery can take up to 10 minutes.

If you don't receive the instructions soon, check your spam or junk folder.

If that doesn't help, try sending the request again.

request.title: Enter your e-mail to reset your password
request.subtitle: We'll send instructions to reset your password to this address

errors.sendBeforeValid: Enter a valid e-mail before sending.

messages.sent: An e-mail with password reset instructions has been sent.
messages.unregistered: The entered e-mail is not registered.
messages.serverError: The server is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
messages.genericFail: Failed to send password reset. Please try again.
messages.connectionError: Error sending the request. Check your connection.

changed.title: Password changed successfully
changed.message: You can now sign in to your account.

errors.req_not_met: Password does not meet the requirements

name.title:
Enter your first name, last name
and choose a nickname
name.name: First name *
name.real_name_warning: If you don’t provide a nickname, other users will see your real name.

city.title: Where are you located?
city.subtitle: To share news relevant to your area, we’ll need your postal code (used for targeting notifications) and municipality (the town displayed to other users). This step is optional.

errors.error_ocured: An error occurred :( Please try again

overview.title: Information overview
overview.subtitle: Information overview
overview.marketing_consent: I agree to receive marketing communications
overview.check_details: Please check that your details are correct before confirming registration.

errors.error_ocured: An error occurred :( Please try again

alreadyVerified.title: E-mail already verified
alreadyVerified.message: Your e-mail has already been verified. You can log in.

emailVerify.info: We have sent a verification link to "{email}". Click the link to confirm your e-mail address.

success.title: E-mail verified
success.message: Your e-mail has been successfully verified!
success.subtitle: You can now sign in to your account.

failed.title: Verification failed
failed.subtitle:
The verification link is invalid or has expired.
Please try again.

alreadyVerified.title: E-mail already verified
alreadyVerified.message: This e-mail has already been verified.

dialogs.info: To continue signing in, please verify your e-mail ({email}).\nA verification link has been sent to this address. Click the link to confirm.

errors.noInternetMap: No internet connection. The map is unavailable.
errors.guest_user: This feature is not available for guest users.
errors.guest_user_desc: To unlock the full potential of the app, please create an account or log in.

guest_user_rules.title: Functionality for guest users
guest_user_rules.content: Since you are using the app as a guest user, some functionalities are limited. You won't be able to save or upload recordings, and certain features may be restricted. To unlock the full potential of the app, please create an account or log in.
